text: Hi there - I have a client using Quoter currently to create quotes/invoices for clients for 3500 microsft skus- we are wondering if we can replicate this in our product/quote builder in HubSpot? anyone have any ideas for process to solve for this use case/ he'd want to create a "store" per customer, publish their specific skus and prices, and allow them to "order" which would generate a quote for signature- this # of clients this would be for is about 5-10, so in theory could we import the 3500 skus - then clone then for each "client" store to input pricing for them that can live on a landing page they can select/create a quote from OR is there a better way to do this?
I am looking for developer to help me.
